DOC.brief_summary: The objective ambispective cohort study describe clinical management clinical outcome related bipolar disorder China , establish factor associate different management pattern clinical outcome , provide psychiatrist reliable up-to-date information disease .
DOC.brief_title: Observation Study Clinical Management Bipolar Disorder
DOC.criteria: Provision subject inform consent . Diagnosis Bipolar Disorder I II ( DSMIV TR ) phase disorder . Patients least one mood event ( depression , mania , hypomania mixed ) accord DSMIV TR definition 3 12 month prior begin study . Inability complete Patient Reported Outcomes ( PROs ) questionnaires . Participation interventional clinical study last 12 month .
